text: one season 32 teams one quadrillion
possible schedule combinations so how
does the NFL develop the optimal
schedule 10 years ago the NFL used a
whiteboard to manually craft one to two
schedules per year today the NFL relies
on AWS to power its schedule making
process as soon as the Super Bowl ends
the NFL starts running a complex
algorithm to analyze potential season
schedules until it finds the ideal one
accounting for over 30,000 factors since
2014 the NFL has analyzed over 1 million
potential season schedules and utilized
over 400,000 Amazon ec2 spot instances
equating to 200 million instance hours
leveraging spot instances to build the
season schedule has enabled the NFL to
deliver a better Fan Experience and save
them over $20 million if AWS can do this
for the NFL imagine what it can do for
your business
